recipe.title: Warm Brussels Sprout Salad
ingredients: 12 large brussels sprouts, leaves separated, core discarded (about 12 cups)
instructions: Cook butter in large skillet over medium heat until just beginning to brown. Add brussels sprout leaves. Toss until just beginning to wilt but still green, about 3 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.
